question: What are the UX items discussed?
facts: John suggests using a modular design for the product, which will allow for easy addition or removal of features as needed.
Sara proposes using a responsive design to ensure the product works well on all devices.
Mike suggests using a dark theme for the user interface, as it is trendy and reduces eye strain for users.
Sara suggests using websockets to improve latency and provide real-time updates, but Mike proposes holding off on this feature for now due to the amount of work involved.
